title: Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
description:
For our listeners new and old, we’re changing up our basic bitch quickie model starting this week! This segment is still where we do a lightning round of top headlines from the week and give a quick top of mind thoughts about it. BUT we’re shifting it a little bit to be it’s own show piece on our weekly schedule! We’ll be doing a Basic Bitch Quickie Round Up at the beginning of the week, to be released on Mondays, to go over top headlines, quick overviews of up to date shows from the week and much more! See below for the topics of the week:



->Kayne Saga continues

  • People he’s started to attack that are friends with Pete
  • Posting Kim’s texts on twitter
  • Break up w/ Julia Fox
  • Kayne’s petition of Kim’s divorce request to be listed as single


->Travis Scott & Kylie Jenner welcome their second child - Wolf


->Clayton Bachelor Season Update - Crazy Shanae


Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
